about_the_game:
HOW WE KNOW WE'RE ALIVE Supporter's Edition is an optional trove of expanded bonus content which includes:

  • New and lovingly crafted digital art book 'HÄRUNGA FOREVER' containing artwork, behind the scenes and production notes
  • 5x High quality custom made desktop wallpapers (3840 × 2160)
  • 4x Animated and looping custom made desktop wallpapers (3440x1440 / 2560x1440)
  • 6x High quality custom made phone backgrounds (1080x1920)
  • 4x Animated custom made phone backgrounds (1080x1920)
  • Remastered version of the original soundtrack including unused tracks, composed by Ivan Starenius
detailed_description:
HOW WE KNOW WE'RE ALIVE Supporter's Edition is an optional trove of expanded bonus content which includes:

  • New and lovingly crafted digital art book 'HÄRUNGA FOREVER' containing artwork, behind the scenes and production notes
  • 5x High quality custom made desktop wallpapers (3840 × 2160)
  • 4x Animated and looping custom made desktop wallpapers (3440x1440 / 2560x1440)
  • 6x High quality custom made phone backgrounds (1080x1920)
  • 4x Animated custom made phone backgrounds (1080x1920)
  • Remastered version of the original soundtrack including unused tracks, composed by Ivan Starenius
